doyoumind.parsers package¶

Submodules¶

doyoumind.parsers.color_image module¶

doyoumind.parsers.color_image.parse_color_image(context, snapshot)¶

Parses the color image from the snapshot.

Parameters

  • context (utils.Context) – the context object representing the folders

  • snapshot (str) – the snapshot data to be parsed (in json format)

Returns

the result of the parser (in json format)

Return type

str

Module contents¶

doyoumind.parsers.collect_parsers()¶

dynamically collects the parsers for which we support all of their fields.
